feature1Title.en: Find the best prices on different chains.

feature1Detail1.zh: i. 聚合不同链上领先的DEXs

feature1Detail2.zh: Ii. 智能化推荐最有效的交易路线

feature1Detail3.zh: Iii. 安全交易没有隐藏费用

roadmapQ1Detail1.en: Launch the website. Publish the light paper.

roadmapQ2Q3Detail2.en: Publish O3 Swap white paper and economic model.
roadmapQ2Q3Detail2.zh: 发布O3 SWAP白皮书与经济模型

roadmapQ4Detail2.en: Support BSC, HECO, and Layer 2 aggregation protocol.
roadmapQ4Detail2.zh: 支持币安链，火币链，及layer2聚合协议

roadmap2022Detail1.zh: 发布V2，支持即时询价，挂单交易
